thread.title: Bears elevate LB Jonathan Anderson from practice squad
thread.title_full: Bears elevate LB Jonathan Anderson from practice squad

author: Associated Press
title: Bears elevate LB Jonathan Anderson from practice squad
text:
LAKE FOREST, Ill. -- The Chicago Bears have elevated linebacker Jonathan Anderson to the active roster from the practice squad.
Anderson is an undrafted rookie out of TCU. He spent the first five weeks of the season on Chicago's practice squad.
The Bears announced the move Wednesday.
